name: One Trick Wizard
description:
This game was made in a week for the VRJam2022 with the theme "One Time Use."

Delve into a spooky turn-based dungeon crawler as a wizard who can't memorize spells. Scroll's burn up when cast, so keep finding more before getting eaten.

CREDITS: Dynamic music score, sound effects, and art was created by Francis Roberts. I made the game with Unity, the monster & scroll with Blender & Substance Painter, and the environment was built with the Toby Fredson Modular Dungeon pack. Cover art was made by the Midjourney ai bot.
